content: Israel’s Rebelliousness and the Lord’s Deliverances.
Oh give thanks to the , for He is good;
For His mercy  lovingkindness endure forever!
Who can put into words the mighty deeds of the ?
Or who can proclaim all His praise [that is due Him]?
Blessed are those who observe justice [by honoring God’s precepts],
Who practice righteousness at all times.
